titles: A declaration and protestation against the illegal, detestable, oft-condemned, new tax and extortion of excise in general; and for hops (a native incertain commodity) in particular. By William Prynne of Swainswick, Esq;
author: Prynne, William, 1600-1669.
publisher: Printed for the author, and are to be sold by Edward Thomas in Green-Arbor,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Excise tax --  England --  Early works to 1800.
